overview: I, a documentary filmmaker got married without any preparation and became a mother in the same way. I was having doubts over my qualifications for being a mother, but I did not give up my work. For 10 years, I brought up 3 children and I can say that was a time during which I cared for my inner self. I realize that my inner self is a child and in need of care. So this film is a sort of baby book which confesses how a person like me could be a mother.
tagline: Mother is a very ordinary word but it stands for an impossible mission.
title: My Sweet Baby
